sentences.en: He evaded police by climbing through a window and shinning down a drainpipe.
sentences.cn: 他翻窗从下水道管子爬下，从而躲过了警察。

sentences.en: He reports that there Is a drainpipe leading up to the balcony.
sentences.cn: 他说那边有个排水管可以爬上去到阳台.

sentences.en: I heard you climb the drainpipe.
sentences.cn: 我听到你爬排水管的声音了.

sentences.en: I told her about him climbing up the drainpipe.
sentences.cn: 我对她讲了他从排水管爬上去的事儿.

sentences.en: Isrel businessman wants to import drainpipe, asbestus , and alluminum alloy material.
sentences.cn: 以色列商人求购排水管(三元乙丙橡胶制) 、 矿(石)棉、铝合金材料.

sentences.en: It was a small trick to slide down the drainpipe.
sentences.cn: 滑下排水管就不过是小玩艺罢了.

sentences.en: Some of the best extensions are made from sections of rod tube or drainpipe.
sentences.cn: 最好的延长管中有些是用杆管或排水管制成的。

sentences.en: The cat burglar must have climbed up that drainpipe.
sentences.cn: 飞贼一定是从排水管爬上去的.

sentences.en: The drainpipe conducts excess water from the well.
sentences.cn: 排水管把多余的水从井中排出.

sentences.en: The drainpipe has plugged up because of something settling in it.
sentences.cn: 排水管因为有什么东西沉淀在里面而堵塞了.

sentences.en: Thieves shinned up a drainpipe and forced open the window.
sentences.cn: 窃贼沿一根水管爬上去撬开窗户.

sentences.en: Water escaped rapidly from the drainpipe.
sentences.cn: 水从排水管中迅速流出.

sentences.en: We saw some kids shinning up a drainpipe before legging it clutching a TV and hi-fi.
sentences.cn: 我们看见几个年轻人爬上了排水管，后来就见他们提着一台电视机和音响跑掉了。

words.tran_cn: 排水管；瘦裤腿（口语，单复数相同）

trans.tran_en: a pipe that carries rainwater away from the roof of a building
